suppress.notes: CVE-2025-15104 targets validator.nu (Nu Html Checker) and is misattributed to org.hibernate.validator:hibernate-validator. No patched Maven release is available for Hibernate Validator.
CVE-2025-7962 affects Jakarta Mail 2.0.2; angus-activation is at 2.0.3 via Spring Boot 3.4.11. A patched angus-activation release is not available in Maven Central at this time.
